com.cognifide.qa.bb.proxy

Class RequestFilterRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cognifide.qa.bb.proxy.RequestFilterRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.lightbody.bmp.filters.RequestFilter

    public class RequestFilterRegistry
extends Object
implements net.lightbody.bmp.filters.RequestFilter
    This class allows to dynamically register and unregister RequestFilter objects in the current proxy.
